meanings.definition: Showing signs of mental instability or eccentric behavior.
meanings.sent1: She is the nuttiest person I know, always talking to invisible friends.
meanings.sent2: The man down the street is known as the nuttiest in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the nuttiest guest wore a hat made of balloons.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were the nuttiest, like planting a garden in the middle of the road.
meanings.sent5: The nuttiest squirrel in the park would only eat acorns shaped like hearts.

meanings.definition: Most extreme or outrageous in a particular group or category.
meanings.sent1: That roller coaster is the nuttiest ride in the amusement park.
meanings.sent2: Among all the flavors, the chili chocolate was the nuttiest ice cream.
meanings.sent3: The nuttiest outfit at the party was a neon pink suit with polka dot shoes.
meanings.sent4: His plan to build a treehouse in one day was the nuttiest idea yet.
meanings.sent5: The nuttiest stunt in the movie involved jumping off a moving train onto a hot air balloon.
